content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed trying to take a late afternoon nap when i saw an airplane, and underneath it (far away from it), i saw this object. i thought it was a helium balloon, but it didn't sway or shift in the wind like one. it also was perfectly round w/o no sort of decoration or writing on it and it "trailed" steadily below the airplane! i then opened the gate to my fire-escape window to get a better look and saw it fly back toward downtown, where the airplane seemed to be heading.I lost sight of it b/c it flew over my building. (i live in harlem on 149th street, 6th floor) about 2 minutes later after i called my daughter to come out and look for it and retrieved her camera, i saw a helicopter--not sure what kind, but it was black and it made a couple of rotations in the same area where i saw the object.
content.summary: A round shiny ball-like object

content.detailedDescription:
I belong to a group of artists called "monday morning painters" who meet every monday morning for breakfast,usually from 8:00 to 9:00 am, at various area restaurants before choosing a site to paint that day.
     on this particular day, june 7, 2004, we decided to paint at toledo's "international park" which is opposite downtown on the east side of the maumee river.
     i take my digital camera with me and take many photos of the area before i decide which scene to paint. i took many photos of area restaurants and the toledo skyline before joining the rest of the group in the park. after talking to several of the painters for a short time i decided not to paint that day and headed back to my car.
     as i approached the parking lot i decided the rear of the various restaurants was more more interesting than the fronts, so i took out my camera and starting again.
     i downloaded the photos into my computer that evening however i had no reason to enlarge and inspect them at that time so they sat in their folder until july 16, 2004. when i enlarged the photo of the rear of one of the restaurants i thought i had captured a plane or seagull in flight.The spot on the thumbnail was so small that i hadn't even seen it.I enlarged it several times to be sure i was seeing a real, without a doubt, ufo. i'm sorryto this day that i deleted the photo from the camera, but i didn't know what i had at the time.
     i was a ufo "wantabeliever" since the mid-fifties...Now i believe!
there is an attachment (which i hope you receive). please acknowledge.
content.summary: Not seen by eye...By camera only !

content.detailedDescription: I am a huge astronomy buff and view the sky every evening, weather permitting. i make it a habit to turn all of the outdoor lighting off for better viewing with my telescope. the event began at 3:30 am in montgomery, alabama with a single, low altitude object arriving from the northwest and becoming stationary. i immediately realized the craft was not a plane, helicopter or anything i recognized because of it's coloration and behavior. minutes later, other objects began to eminate from the first object in all directions at different intervals. all of the other objects were similar in shape and light features to the first object, just smaller. then the show began. the objects in total were too numerous to count and performed spectacular aerial manuevers for two solid hours. my wife, who also witnessed the event, and i were exhilerated beyond description. neither of us have ever witnessed such a massive ufo event before and i can assure you that we were completely mesmerized. we simply sat down on the ground and watched in total awe the magnificent display that was occuring right in our own backyard! we did not lose sight of the objects until the sun rose, and only then because they just seemed to "fade away"!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc shaped objects which alternated between red and white

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and 4 other friends were out at the quarry {in ohio} around 11:00pm on a hot august night.
we were sitting there talking -when we suddenly heard a loud humming sound and heard dogs barking in the distance.
we had no idea what was going on.
out of no where there was a big beautiful bright light in the sky.
we were not scared as we watched it do a light show for us.
we would say--go up and it did
go down and it did.
go to the right or left and it did as we asked.
the humming had stopped and the dogs too.
we watched this object for about 15 min.And then it vanished!
we went into town and told the sheriff and he siad we were all drunk.
not true--none of us had been drinking or doing any drugs.
we all had good eyesight and were all somewhat normal.
3 nights later -at 1:00am--i started to go out my front door as my friend was leaving and that same object was above my house!
it was shaped like a cigar -it was silver and it had windows and lights all around it .
we froze--thinking we were crazy.
the object just hoovered there and --poof it was gone!
we ran back into the house -somewhat scared this time.
we kept looking out the window--but it never came back.
the next morning we went to the local newspaper and told them our story.
they told us they had received over 35 calls about the same object!
ok --we were all 16 & 17 at the time but we know what we saw.
10 days after this incident 3 men from wright patterson air base paid me a visit!
they wanted the names of everyone who was with me that night and then asked what we saw.
i told them and they wrote everything down.
the older and bigger man-turned as they were leaving and stared at me and said--your mind can play some pretty weird tricks on you.
they insisted it was a weather balloon-but we knew different.
weeks after the sighting i had a terrible headache and earache for 3 days.
i later found out that 3 of the other people there that night --had the same thing.
now here is the spooky part.
we went out to the quarry around 9:45 pm--we saw the ufo around 11:00 pm--the next thing we all knew--it was 3:00 am and we are in town getting the sheriff!
so where did 4 hours go thet we can't account for?
that was 42 years ago and in that time there are only 2 of us alive from the group that night.
the other girl --who is still alive--is the one who was at my house the night it was over my house!
in those 42 years i have seen 2 other strange objects.
one in 1993 the everglades fl.--and the other in 1987 in tarpon springs fl.
both looked like the one i saw in 1965!
my friend -since 1965 has seen 1 strange object-and it caused her to have a major car accident in 1993!
the 3 other people who were with me that night in ohio--never really believed we saw a ufo-but they never talked about it either.
one committed suicide--one was killed in a boating accident and the other died from cancer.
in the 42 years after the sighting--i have been in 5 car accidents--2 boating accidents---and a domestic violence scene.
my father died--my fiance was killed in a car accident-i lost twin girls at birth--i was robbed at knifepoint--i was raped--my house was burned down and another one was blown down in a hurricane.
i got a divorce--i worked 2 jobs-raising 3 kids alone and now my grandbaby has epilepsy--i fell at a friends pool and hurt my back but let me tell you what----
i love life and i appreciate everyday.
i have 3 wonderful kids--and 3 beautiful grandchildren.
they all live near by and i see them everyday!
i have great friends--a beautiful home--a new car-and life is good.
some say--my goodness you must have bad luck or be cursed.
say what?
i have great luck and there are no curses.
but i always catch myself staring up at the sky at night still wondering!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 of us saw a ufoand we were not scared-it was beautiful!

content.detailedDescription:
As a part of a gathering at benson's hideaway for, ironically, ufo daze, an annual event. i was standing in the area between the restaurant and the north bay of long lake.

pulsating lights two per object, green in color, having length and shape similar to a pair of fluorescent ceiling lights, (parallel to each other) running longitudinally in direction of travel. object appeared solid when viewed through a pair of 10x50 binoculars during lapses between light pulsations. shape could not be recognized. because the theme of the event was sky-watching, i happened to have ready a pair of binoculars.

a single object with pulsating green lights (as described above) was visible traveling approximately 025 degrees true, (compared against the position of polaris with the chair of cassiopeia in the north-east sky), followed in less than a minute by two more identical objects in rough trailing formation. the last two objects were visible for three minutes through binoculars over a hill with an estimated topographic crest of 200 feet above base terrain. estimated speed of 24,000 feet per minute when the course was measured against a satellite image of the area.

in the next hour and a half solid green intense single points of lights were visible, having the color and intensity of an emerald laser or targeting laser of russian design moving in an approximate arc from southeast to northeast, but these did not appear attached to a solid object as the first three objects and on occasion emitted an aura or laser-like luminescence that rotated or changed relative position to the point of light intensity. the speed of these lights appeared slower than the first three objects, but altitude, distance and speed were difficult to estimate. all appeared height above the high terrain by approximately 5-6 inches when measured at arms length. all solid lights appeared to fly remarkably through the same airspace (course and altitude) over the duration of their individual observations.

none of the objects or lights produced audible sound, were devoid of conventional aircraft running lights, and were radically different in appearance from aircraft, satellites, meteors and other normal night sky occurrences visible that evening.

air temperature: approximately 75 f.

cieling and visibility unlimited.

lightning visible in the distant northern sky near midnight.

i am a former military aviator, and the only reaction i recall having was not being able to classify what i was seeing. it was more like experiencing science fiction virtual reality.
content.summary: Fluorescent-green parallel ceiling lights in line formation flying north of dundee wisconsin

content.detailedDescription: I saw this light tuesday (7/18/2006). i was looking in a westerly direction. it was moving north rather slowly with no sound or trail of any kind. i attach the original and one enlargement. i was able to take more than one picture of the object but they all turned out very similar.
content.summary: Light in sky moving slowly north

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i had just gotten out of the car and were walking north up the driveway when i saw a greenish-white ball of light shoot across the horizon from south to north.  it lasted about one second and then disappeared out of sight.  i asked my sister if she just saw the shooting star and she said "is that what that was?"  i suppose it could have been a shooting star, but it was much larger in size than a shooting star and the vivid green color of it was unlike any shooting star i'd ever seen.  am wondering if anyone else in southeastern wisconsin last night saw this?  when i got in the house i immediately did a google search on "report ufo" and came across this website and ufo wisconsin, where i also filed a report.
content.summary: Greenish-white fireball shoots horizontally from south to north for about one second

content.detailedDescription:
*i have included a video clip of the event. it's not very good i know. i had a little trouble with the zoom on a new camera but there are a few quick shots of the object. it is hard to see it in the video, maybe with some software it can be zoomed in on or cleaned up. i did increase the brightness since the sun had set the video was a little dark. i do have the original still on the tape.

several family members and i were sitting on the front porch talking when i noticed the object coming over the trees. at first i thought it was a jet and it looked about that size at first and typically like what you would see as a jet is approaching (when i say jet i mean like an f14 or that type) at an air show altitude. but as i studied it i noticed it had no fuselage and it was moving quite slow... probably a little smaller than a jet would be at that altitude. after watching for a minute or two i said out loud "what is that?" at that point the others jumped up and we all went out to the front lawn to get a better look. i was not the only one that was trying to figure out what this thing was. it didn't act like any object i have ever seen. as we continued to watch i asked my wife to run in and get my camera. originally she thought it was a balloon, but as the object got closer it did not rotate or act like a balloon would. i would not expect a balloon to stay pointed in the direction it was going and it would have been a very large balloon and triangular? it stayed straight on with the tip of the triangle shape pointed in the direction it was traveling like this \/. i might also add that it appeared to have something on the left and right side that appeared round in shape. i couldn't tell what they were but they were located about midway down what would be the wing or side of the object and sticking out just enough to notice.  that's the best i can do on discription. anyway the object traveled at what appeared to be the same speed but was climbing. it started out traveling directly toward us in a southwest direction and then turned west over the trees and along the treeline, which is also a creek and bike trail. it then faded back into a southwest direction and out of sight behind trees. by the time it was out of our site i estimate it had reached a low cloud altitude. 

object summary: object was black or dark and triangular in shape with small round feature midway back on both sides. it appeared that the round features might have been on the top of each of the triangles sides, maybe spherical and was just visible from our prospective underneath but i'm not sure. moved slowly, but faster than something like a balloon. did not rotate once, stayed pointed in the direction of travel, moving in a southwestern direction then fading west and then south western again. i remember thinking that it was strange that it was coming right at us and when i started filming it went around us... but again i don't know if it actually did that or it just appeared that way. front of the object seamed to be a bit raised... like a plane would when landing. was climbing the whole time we watched it until out of site at a low cloud level. that's about it!
i'm wondering if anyone else saw anything? and what did we all saw that day. we certainly don't know!
content.summary: Black or dark triangle/no sound/no lights, moving slow at dusk

*i have included a video clip of the event. it's not very good i know. i had a little trouble with the zoom on a new camera but there are a few quick shots of the object. it is hard to see it in the video, maybe with some software it can be zoomed in on or cleaned up. i did increase the brightness since the sun had set the video was a little dark. i do have the original still on the tape.

content.detailedDescription: Unbelieveable,was a non believer until this happened   wow!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Disc came over water and hovered for a minute then disappeared in a second.

content.detailedDescription:
I cannot say for certain what "shape" this object or obtects were as it was quite high in the night sky,  though it did appear to move from left to right like a moderate game of pong.

i was initially sitting on my front deck having a cigarette (my girlfriend forbids me to smoke inside) and i was trying to count the number of stars i could see - for the record, i counted less than a dozen, as here in montreal the city lights prevent us from seeing many stars at all.

above a large building directly across the street from our condo, i noticed a larger and significantly brighter light to the left of where i was looking (about a 10 o'clock from my perch and above the large building).

i assumed for about 10 minutes that it was a plane as there are several planes seen flying in that direction daily.  

it ttkes about 7 minutes for me to smoke one cigarette and in that time the light remained in that general area in the sky though it had moved left and right and visibly so.  i thought perhaps it were a star "flickering" as stars are known to do but this particular light seemed to "dance" - up, down and around,  then left and right again.

i honestly can't tell you even an estimate of altitude,  sorry, i'm not a good judge of distance.  i finished my cigarette and stepped back into the house to ask my girlfriend to come look at the "funky light".

her immediate assumption was "it's a star".  i told her to look at it - watch it closely and she then noticed as well that it appeared to be dancing about.

my girlfriend ran into the house to grab a camera (kodak z740, digital) and began clicking photos.  i have all of those photos if you'd like to see them.

i attempted to video the light but my camera did not function.

i really can't describe any "feelings".  i see lights in the sky often but nothing ever looked like this.  as i write this now however,  i'm wondering only if anyone else has or will report similar sighting(s) from this area.


i'm no photo expert,  nor am i a camera expert.  the 3 images i've included here are what my girlfriend took with her camera.  from what she's told me,  she's lightended or enhanced them somewhat.  we still have the originals,  and full sizes and there are many others if you need them.

thanks,
todd langseth
content.summary: Unable to determine the shape of this object. moving left to right, up/down and pulsating slightly.

content.detailedDescription: My story is true, i was not alone, two people on earth know for a fact that we are not alone. a friend and i were coming home in his 1967 camaro convertible on a clear summer night. coming from high springs fl to our homes in nearby branford we decided to stop at a river clear as spring water (ichnetucnee ?), this was in 1976 when you could drive on either side of bridge down to waters edge to pee out of sight next to road. he drove down and turned car around so when we were done we could take right off (had to be home by 12:00). the car was 100 feet from river and each of us stood by car and when i finished i left the passenger side of car and ran down to river to get a drink, while i cupped up the water in my hands i noticed the red reflection of brake lights on the water, then realized he was still busy, that's when i turned thinking maybe another car stopped and bam my life forever changed. hwy 27 is a small two lane road and right in the middle of it was a red or more so of an orange craft encased in a perfect sphere of what i can only describe as energy, no sound, none just drifting over the road heading the way we were at maybe 10 miles an hour. this thing was about the size of a dumptruck 25 feet above the road. i remember this as if it just happened, i walked to the car never taking my eyes off of this craft until my friend yelled for me to get in (he was scared and in shock, i just wanted to meet who was in it). we sat there and i say hey, lets go i want to see what this really is and he slowly pulled up the incline back to the road and now we are right behind it. the top of the car was down and i'm standing in the floorboard hanging over the windshield trying to see details through this glow, i can see structure but can make out no details (other than something is in the orange sphere),i notice the wind making tears so i duck under the windshield, then decide to see how fast we are going, trust me when i say this poor inline 6 cyl on its best day could not go 110 but thats what the speedo said and it was pegged. he's asking what is it whats inside and i say i'm not sure but it's fixing to wipe out a caution light hanging across the road and we better back off in case the cable's fly through this car, and just before it hits them it turns up and to the left so fast missing the caution light, left from where we were to making an arc folling the planet curve into nothing in 3 to 5 seconds. i'm 45 now but that night i was 16 and right then i knew this was not from here, and while i wanted to believe in ufo's, i always said if i ever see one, then maybe i would. the maybe was always because in my mind, if i ever did see anything, it would be too far away for me to be sure if it were from earth or not. that would not be the case as i learned, we followed this craft for three miles at low speed, kept the same distance from that to over 100 mph for maybe 3 mins. i said to my friend because we were both going ape over this that maybe we should not say anything more until we can write down what we each saw, and draw it also when we got home, our notes matched and then we began to talk more of it. i have only heard of a few people who descibe what i saw that night, and i believe them- now.
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: Upon getting the camera for a picture of the moon, hanging low in the southwest that evening, i noticed a strange light hovering about 2 o clock from the moon.  barely floating within a sphere with a diameter of a centimeter from where i was watching from my deck.  it hovered there for about 10 minutes, then it moved in a southwest diagonal direction and then did a sharp, quick, left pointing check mark movement heading upwards at a 45 degree angle fading out quickly like a shooting star.  i thought it was a star or plane at first, but immediately could tell that it was neither.  i guess bewilderment as to what it was was what i felt.  then i wondered if it would come out with the digital camera, sony dsc p-30.  the first shot was taken at 1:11 am, the second at 1:18 am, and the moon shot was taken at 1:24 am.  then i ran down to get my sig other, excited as to what i saw, but she wouldn't wake up.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Polygon shaped w/ lights

content.detailedDescription: Okay um... i saw the pretty sun set outside in my back yard and decided to take a picture of it.  so i did and when i got the film developed i saw the ufo!
content.summary: I saw the sunset outside so i wanted to take a pic of it, and when i developed the film i saw it!

content.detailedDescription: Okay um... i saw the pretty sun set outside in my back yard and decided to take a picture of it.  so i did and when i got the film developed i saw the ufo!
content.summary: I saw the sunset outside so i wanted to take a pic of it, and when i developed the film i saw it!

content.detailedDescription: I was on the beach and it flow bye real quick.I thought it was a plane but it was way to fast
content.summary: It was black, long like a cigar but also was tirangle shaped and had fins on the end

content.detailedDescription: I awoke one weekend morning and glanced out my window to what seemed to be a helicopter hovering over the trees ,as i stared more piercingly i could not see a tail section or rotor. i then got up to a better position in another window where i then opened the window to hear-but heard nothing,then i knew what this was. i tried to guage how far away it was and thought about a mile.As i stood there staring i knew this was not man made at least not on this planet.As i remember the egg shape was point down-it seemed to fade in and out slightly.By the distance and size of craft i thought it would hold 2 or 3 people.As i stood in the window i thought to run and get a camera but the fear of loosing sight of this and missing the event was too great.I lived in the country sticks and there is no noise and very few neighbors.I wondered how can that thing just hang there -what was its power source?What is it up to?As i intently stared at it i could see a faint purplish gas or hue at and around the bottom wich would appear and disappear-could that be it?Its power source?Who knows...Have they harnessed magnitism or gravity to travel?...Then it just faded away...A few days later someone had told me there was an article in the paper about it-i was not the only one.
content.summary: Egg shaped craft  jjust over trees  stationary occasional fading no sound  daylight

content.detailedDescription: Just a few minutes ago my wife and i were on our deck stargazing. i was looking up and to the north, my wife looking to the west. i saw 2 flashes of light in my peripheral vision and my wife said did you see that and i said i saw a flash then a few seconds later as we were both looking to the west we saw 3 very distinct circular pulses of light about a second apart at approximately 30-40 degrees above the horizon and slightly north of west. the light was slightly brighter than the brighest stars. there did not appear to be any horizontal or vertical motion of the pulses. we continued to watch for a few minutes and saw nothing else. my reaction was of great curiosity as to what could have caused the distinct pulses of light. i'm still a bit baffled by the sighting.
content.summary: 5 pulses of light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking toward my house and happened to look up towards the east at what i initially thought was a yellowish color star.  and almost parallel to that was another yellowish color star. so, i waited and watched to see if they were in fact stars or if they were moving using a telephone wire to determine any movement.  they both moved slowly at which point i thought that they may have be airplanes. they looked like they were approximately 5 - 10 miles away. i thought it strange that two planes would be flying so close together going in the same direction.  also i didn't see the typical green and red lights on either side -- just these big amber color lights.  all of a sudden they just disappeared.  i thought perhaps they had flown behind clouds.  when i looked straight up i saw stars and other planes that seemed to be flying at higher altitudes than what i had just seen.  just for the record, i have never in my life seen anything that strange.  i think i'm more curious to know if anyone else in new jersey saw these strange amber color lights at that time.  i didn't think to take photos...  i thought i was just looking a star.
content.summary: Two yellow/amber color lights

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, my friend and i decided to sit outside and watch the stars.  at approximately 10:30 pm i saw a light low in the sky.  i showed my friend and we watched it as it travelled east, and then turned south.  i could not make out a shape.  but, living this close to pittsburgh international, i can tell you that if it were an airplane, how low and close it was to us.  we should have been able to hear something.  but, it was silent.  it only appeared to be an orangish colored light.  and, it would brighten up and dim out at times.  this sighting went on for about a minute.  until we lost it behind some houses.  i would also like to point out that it was headed north.  if it had been going to the airport on a normal flight pattern, it would have been heading west.  if it had been a jet just taking off, it would have been gaining altitude.  it was headed in the general direction towards downtown.

after seeing this.  my friend and i walked out to the road to see if this object was visable again.  it was not.  we were both scanning the skies, seeing if there was anything going on.  i turned around, and saw my friend looking at something.  i looked up and saw a white flashing strobe.  it was pretty high up, travelling north.  nothing appeared out of the ordinary.  it was completely consistant with what a jet would be doing.  just as i was thinking that, the strobes stopped.  my friend turned around, and was freaked out a little.  i told him i had seen it.  and kept looking.  about 5 seconds later, they reappeared.  still travelling along the same path, same apparent speed, etc.  another 5 seconds went by, and they stopped again.  they did not start back up.  i am sure this could have been an airplane of some sort.  but, i have never seen, or heard of one flying blacked out like that.  the strobes were the only lights on it.  i never saw any marker lights.

after a few more minutes, we decided to go back up to the porch, as our necks were hurting from standing out in the road staring straight up at the sky.  we were laying out on some lawn chairs just discussing what we had seen.  trying to come up with reasonable explainations.  at this time, i saw what appeared to be a satellite travelling north.  i pointed it out to my friend and we watched it traverse the sky.  after about 30 seconds of watching it, i told him the one i had seen the night before (in another state) was a lot brighter.  just after i said that, this object got much brighter.  it stayed that way for a second, and then dimmed back out.  my friend was a little freaked out.  but, i didn't find it alarming.  i know they have satellites (iridium) which can appear to flare up, and dim out like that.  i continued to watch it though.  then about 10 seconds later, it flared up big time.  like nothing i have ever seen.  it was just a bright flash, a very bright flash.  it made me jump a little.  after the flash, the object was no longer visable.  i've seen satellites plenty of times.  it was clear last night.  i should have been able to see a satellite for quite a bit more time.  it was just simply gone.

i am a fairly experienced observer.  i keep up on what we have up there, and how it's supposed to behave.  i can't explain what the orangish colored light was.  i do no know why that "plane" blacked out like that.  and if that was a satellite, it flared up much brighter than i have ever seen an iridium satellite flare.
content.summary: Ufos over and around pittsburgh

content.detailedDescription:
Very busy night in the skies over delray beach, florida last night.
a few sightings took place. the first was at 10:45pm to my west again the object was the same as last night - a pulsating object except this time the pulsate was much faster then last night i saw this for about 5 seconds then black. also i noticed very highflying military jets last night i counted 4 of them. the second sighting was at 1:07am and this would be the 17th of july.
i was just about ready to call it a night and i saw a object streak to the east so i moved the camera to the east about 3 mins later i heard a very strange low humming noise like an electrical noise or the hum of a generator coming from the sky above me and you can hear it in the video but at first i didn't see anything then from behind a cloud something was moving to the west. i aimed the camcorder up and tried to zoom in on it and i got to tell you its very difficult to clearly film something when its moving and you are zoomed in on it.

i just viewed the film and most of it is blurry due to the constant moving to keep the object in view. i have managed to capture a few frames of the object when image is stable on the camcorder.
i'm new to this and am learning about shooting video.
ok so the images are very strange looking and i have no idea what it is.
i do know its not a plane. planes at night you cannot see them in the dark sky except the blinking lights.
this object was lit up. its kind of long like a cigar shape and it was moving to the right in the pictures. i thought it was a triangle at first but after reviewing the object on digital video i think it was cigar shape.
no blinking lights on it at all.
i'll include video and 2 still images of this object.
i will do an update later and put up the mpg video and a couple more pictures.
thanks jc
content.summary: Objects sighted 5th night in a row in delray beach, florida

content.detailedDescription: I was on life guard duty at a housing development pool when i observed this object over the tree line from the pool . i am 22 years old , and this was somthing highly unusul . it was north of my location perhaps a mile away and about 400-500 feet high , on hyw 29 outside of the city of charlotte , very close the hwy 485 by pass and close the the charlotte motor speedway.At first i thought it was some type of helicopter or blimp , but i quickly realized it was something entirely different than anything i have ever  seen before. it gave me an extremely eerie feeling and gave  me quite a sense of anxiety . it moved steady forward with up and down movements in a sort circular pattern ,  without any sound . i then dissapeared below the tree line from my position. there were no other witnesses at my location at this time . this is in a very populated area and i would thing other in the area made this observation.
content.summary: Smooth,metallic,not shiny , brushed metal look, no noise,no markings, appx 30-40 ft across

content.detailedDescription: At approx 12:45 am, i stepped outside in my back yard for a cigarette.  a fluttering light in the sky caused me to look up, and i watched the object until it was too far away to see anymore. at first i thought it might be the police helicopter that flies around the skies in our neighbourhood often, but it was too high up, and moved in strange motions at times.  it fluttered in a white flash, and was alot faster then the usual commercial jets that fly over our house everyday.  the object at times "swerved" at incredible speeds, unlike anything i've ever seen in the sky before.  i'd estimate that it traveled about 10 times faster than the normal aircraft we usually see. i did not hear any noise as i watched the object.  it almost seemed to fly in strange flight paths at times, almost like a drunk driver might do..Ie all over the road.  it seemed pretty high up, and i could not decipher a shape.  after seeing it, i was amazed, i wouldn't say it's a life changing experience, but i don't get excited too easily lol. i've always wondered if people just make up the stories about ufo's, but know i now...
content.summary: Fluttering sporatic flight, high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk with my family at the seward park in seattle. it was a clear and sunny day and i was taking photographs with my digital camera (sony cybershot) of the beatiful views on mount ranier. i didn't notice anything unusual in the air until i got home and started looking through the pictures! much to my surprise, one of them had an object in the upper right corner that looks like the classic flying disc/saucer that has become the symbol of ufology. i didn't see any flying objects while taking the picture, so i can't describe its movements and actions. i'm sure i would have remembered if a helicopter had flown by when i took the picture. unfortunately, it's not the best quality, and the bright sunlight made the details somewhat fuzzy. i'm still intriqued by the shape of the object in this photo and wanted to share it. the meta data (date taken, camera used, etc.) of the photo has been left intact and i have not done any editing to it.
content.summary: Ufo photographed at seward park, seattle

content.detailedDescription: I had been living at an airport that my parents managed for the city.I was about sixteen at the time,one of my duties was to put our training aircraft and our charter twin in the hanger at the end of the day.Twilight would best describe the visual conditions.After putting the single engine trainers in the hanger i was preparing to put the twin engine airplane in.(cessna 310)i happened to notice movement in the lower horizon off to the east,(the hanger doors have a southern exposure)i observed four or five opaque disc,s in a single north/south line traveling westward,they disappeared from sight as they reached the western horizon.This took approximately less than a minute.I could not make out any identifying characteristics but i believe they were fairly high,and about three inches in diameter.It is difficult to judge size as one dosn,t know the altitude they are at, there were no contrails nor lights of any kind or any sound.I had lived at the airport all of my life and was familiar with many aircraft,whether this was one object with multiple lights or four or five separate ones is difficult to say with any certaincy.But due to the spacing i,m inclined to say the disc,s were seperate objects.The sighting of these opaque disc,s got my attention because there wasn,t any type of navigation lights,nor rotating beacon lights,then as i listened for the sound of engine noise,thinking i should be able to hear something,but nothing was heard.From what i can remember they crossed the horizon a lot faster than any aircraft i had seen.At the time i thought it might be a ufo but was reluctant to say anything for fear of ridicule,i have 7000 hrs ,most in charter or corporate aircraft ,the largest i have flown is a lear and i have 1000hrs in those.(24,25,35).I am currently working as a aircraft mechanic for a major airline.I have never seen anything since that approximates what i saw and have never spoken to anyone who saw anything similar.
content.summary: I saw 4 or 5 opaque disc,s traverse the horizon from east to west

content.detailedDescription:
I was out side smoking a cigarette and i dont know if i was seeing helicopters ( 3) of them at the same time spread out approx 10:30-10:45 pm est. i saw an unusual flashing coming from each of them, one was closer to my house overhead flying west and that caught my attention. can you check to see if anything was going on unusual in the northwest from my location? they were way off of the flight path normally taken to the airport.Coram long island,ny
ty
randy
content.summary: 3 ufo's in the air at same time

content.detailedDescription: First i called my friend b4rian at 10:00 p.M., and when he came around at 10:15, we were in my room just thinking what to do,and he said "lets play catch with football in the backyard". then i said "okay", so we started to play catch in the backyard. in other words while we kept throwing the football back and forth, something caught my left corner eye and i thought it was an airplane so i starred at it a little bit, but then suddenly it was moving very very weirdly, it was moving like scribbling on paper, the object looked like a starry, sphere, bright, circle light in the sky, and like i said it was moving like scribbling on paper and then when it was moving to the right very slowly, and then it started to dim very softly,and then it just disappeared, also the object had no sound at all, just completely silent like it had no engine in it. my reactions was excited, thats all just excited, then i ran to the door inside my house then i told my dad "hey dad i saw a ufo a little bit ago" and he didnt believe me that much, he thought i was lying to him but it was real. also the way i lost sight of the object was when it started to dim to the right it just disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a ufo in the backyard at night.

content.detailedDescription: at first i thought it might be a bird with a rocket booster on it's tail but after i enlarged it (only) and then enlarged and enhanced it some it can't be a bird. it's projections or whatever they are in the enhanced picture are perfect pyramids no bird i know has. what ever it was must have been moving rapidly. the triangle "original" picture i reported a week or so ago was crystal clear so it must have been moving mighty slow or not at all, but this thing looked like it was moving like a scalded dog. i took the picture about 8:45am this morning from the field in front of my house. attached are the original, an enlargement only, and an enlargement enhanced.
content.summary: Black long object speeding through clear sky

content.detailedDescription:
Puerto rico near san juan in a mountain  region. a very bright light, like those commercial airplanes shine at you when approaching landing, is spotted coming from the south of the house, to later stop over the house giving the appearance of a fireball. no sound, it looks like was not far above. hover there for a few minutes and then started floating away to the north west, slowly, zigzagging as it gain altitude as it disappear.   


me and a small group of friends where sitting at a tv room talking. we where actually talking metaphysics.  there rest of the people where outside on the patio. it was a christmas party, not everybody where drinking. 

the object was first spotted by a woman who screamed that plane is going to hit the house!  we all ran outside to the backyard. what appears to be a plane turned out to look like a ball of fire, brighter at the ouster of the ring and more intense orange color in the center.   i could say it was like a 50 or 60 in diameter from my point of view, which was under the object. 

i felt like it was observing us reviewing the crowd. the party stop after these some where very disturbed by the incident since could not be explained. nothing we have seen could explain this intelligent ball of fire. maybe it was a craft of some source, and all we saw was the energy produced by the engines a year after as we where in a public place talking about the experience a family sitting by overheard us and approached us to tell us they also saw a similar object on the same day around the same time around 5 miles from where we saw the object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A very bright light, like those commercial airplanes shine at you when approaching landing, is spotted coming from the south of the house, to later stop over the house giving the appearance of a fireball. no sound, it looks like it was not far above.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in the backyard pool that afternoon. my wife happened to notice this white dot hovering in position in the direction of north east las vegas in the general direction of nellis afb. our house is located in the north west area. the object caught our attention for several minutes. we thought it could be a balloon which was hanging in the sky. however, my wife asked that if it was a ballon, how could we see it so high up in the sky? the object moved up and down left and right for several minutes before dissapearing into the clouds. 

i have enclosed to pictures i took of the obect with my digital camera. you have to look hard but it's a little white dot in the middle of the picture. it helps if you have a computer program with a zoom option.
content.summary: White dot hovers over nellis afb las vegas.
